name: @shadowspawn/forest-arborist
description: Forest Arborist. A loosely coupled repository manager inspired by Mercurial subrepositories, npm, and Git.

scripts.copy-up: git checkout master && git merge develop && echo "Now bump version appropriately, e.g. run npm version patch && git commit && git push && npm publish"
scripts.copy-down: git checkout develop && git merge master && npm --no-git-tag-version version prepatch
scripts.test:linux: docker build -t fabtest . && docker run fabtest

author: John Gee
